title: [Sponsor] Onin Keyboard Calendar
content:
Only 40% of the plans we make in messaging apps end up in our calendar. Onin is the free iPhone keyboard that brings your calendar into every conversation. Check your calendar, add events, and share invites inside any app. Onin works with all your existing calendars, in all your apps, and is end-to-end encrypted.

 ★
author: Daring Fireball Department of Commerce
